tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_name TEXT,
  resolution TEXT,
  color_depth INT,
  capture_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE images (
    image_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    resolution VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    color_depth INT NOT NULL,
    capture_date DATE NOT NULL
);
